Description: Set up local development environment with Python, Docker, Git, VS Code
Tasks: Install Python 3.9+, pip, virtualenv | Install Docker Desktop | Set up Git and create GitHub account | Install VS Code with Python extensions | Create first GitHub repository for learning journey
Acceptance_Criteria: All tools installed, GitHub repo created with README documenting setup

Description: Learn Python basics: data types, control flow, functions, OOP
Tasks: Study data types, variables, operators (2 hrs) | Practice control flow: if/else, loops (2 hrs) | Learn functions, lambda, decorators (2 hrs) | Study OOP: classes, inheritance (2 hrs)
Resources: Python for Data Engineers - Coursera | https://realpython.com/tutorials/basics/ | https://www.learnpython.org/
Acceptance_Criteria: Complete 20 practice problems on HackerRank Python track

Description: Build a simple Python script to validate CSV data
Tasks: Read CSV file using pandas | Implement data type validation | Check for null values and duplicates | Write validation report to file | Add error handling and logging
Resources: Pandas documentation | Python logging module docs
Acceptance_Criteria: Working script that validates CSV and generates report, pushed to GitHub

Description: Deep dive into SQL: window functions, CTEs, optimization
Tasks: Study window functions: ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LAG/LEAD (2 hrs) | Learn CTEs and recursive queries (2 hrs) | Understand query execution plans (2 hrs) | Study indexing strategies (2 hrs)
Resources: https://mode.com/sql-tutorial/ | https://www.sqlshack.com/sql-performance-tuning-tips-for-newbies/ | Use The Index Luke book (online)
Acceptance_Criteria: Complete Mode Analytics SQL tutorial, document key learnings

Description: Solve SQL problems on LeetCode focusing on optimization
Tasks: Solve 15 Easy SQL problems | Solve 10 Medium SQL problems | Analyze execution plans for solutions | Document optimization techniques used
Acceptance_Criteria: 25+ problems solved, GitHub repo with solutions and explanations

Description: Apply learnings to optimize actual queries from Aquata work
Tasks: Identify 3 slow queries from current work | Analyze execution plans | Apply optimization techniques | Document performance improvements
Resources: Aquata query logs | PostgreSQL EXPLAIN documentation
Acceptance_Criteria: 3 queries optimized with documented performance gains

Description: Set up local development environment with Python, Docker, Git, VS Code
Tasks: Install Python 3.9+, pip, virtualenv | Install Docker Desktop | Set up Git and create GitHub account | Install VS Code with Python extensions | Create first GitHub repository for learning journey
Acceptance_Criteria: All tools installed, GitHub repo created with README documenting setup
